comment: Installed this app to evaluate it when I had the the time to do so. In the meanwhile it just started crashing 3 times a minute and uninstalling is just the most seductive solution, because first impressions count most
Good but sign  error issue

author: royal elenchy
comment: Why request for email?

author: ulendo roode
comment: Reminders are my most used type of app on my phone - always looking for a better one. MarkO ticks most boxes and it's free. If you're into reminder apps - check it out! 4 stars because I'm anxiously awaiting snooze function... Thanks for the updates dev!
title: Very good

comment: Insert address, full address even comes up after only street no and name are entered but the app still cannot find location. Location doesn't work.

author: Ronald Butt
comment: Locations not found or settable. Voice recognition is not very good. Goggle now far superior.
title: May try again later if the bugs get fixed.

author: Jacob Bondt
comment: Useless piece of carbage cannot find any location in Canada ,Google take this app and put it in the carbage can
title: Nexus 5

author: Heather Putnam
comment: I've been trying a lot of these recently and so far this is the best by far. Needs option for check boxes. But I was looking for an app that would float instead of opening the entire app just to add a reminder and found it! Best of all no ads that right there deserves 5 stars! Thanks

author: Betsy Markman
comment: It's clear that lots of thought has gone into making this app. Unfortunately I need things like snooze-able notifications, subtasks, and categories, which are not available here.
title: Shows promise

author: Lisa Caroll
comment: Sometimes it has delayed reminder and doesn't tell me til I have past my set location.  Otherwise I love it.  My memory is really bad and this really helps when it notifies at the right location

author: Tamara Georgievska
comment: I havent been using paper-notes for months, ever since I am using this reminder app. Almost always I manage to finish my daily to-do-list with MarkO. Though I would like to suggest to make something like a calendar overview, or weekly overview of the reminder-notes. It would be a bit more organized when someone will have created daily reminders for the whole week.

reply.author: CodeWell Unlimited
reply.content: Hi Tamara, thanks for the support of MarkO, the Reminder app. We are really happy that you want to contribute to this reminder app and we can say that we will try to implement your notes in some of the next upgrade-versions.

comment: Thanks again for all your help
title: Newly User

title: Very good

comment: Honor 7
title: Doesn't work

author: Jovana Gjorgievska
comment: Great location reminder and perfect to use while preparing for your vacation. It has a wide variety of Categories to choose for you reminder's location. Simple and helpful task manager. Definitely try it if always forget to buy something while packing!

reply.author: CodeWell Unlimited
reply.content: We really appreciate your feedback, Jovana. We are glad MarkO could help you during stressfull times. Have you tried the "Import feature" of our smart reminder? This new input-free can spare you the actual typing of the reminder.

author: Simona Andrieska
comment: With this app I can easily create tasks and get a location reminders for them. I never forget anything anymore, I walk by a location and the reminder is already there.
title: Love this app for creating reminders

author: Eleonora Trajanovska
comment: Just made my life better with the simple reminders. Location reminders are awesome way to get reminded bout your tasks.
title: Exceptionally great reminder

author: Valentin Ambaroski
comment: Awesome reminder and task helper. A feature i really loved is the location reminders  Would recommend to other people

author: Chenyze LoveFood
comment: The location-based reminders are what makes this a little different from most other apps, and it works very well. I'd just like 1) nested check lists and 2) repeat reminders. Thanks!

reply.author: CodeWell Unlimited
reply.content: Hi Chenyze, glad you liked MarkO's location based reminders. The repeat reminders feature is coming soon! :)

title: Location-based reminders work well

author: Ning Jiang
comment: This is the app I always wanted. I like the location based reminder. I would love to see what others are doing at a location. Good job!
title: Very good idea

author: Victoria James
comment: MarkO - Reminders & Tasks is a great application to get reminders about your daily tasks... Really useful...

comment: If you have ADDED this will save you life..lol Great app ez to use.. have not found a better reminder and its FREE.
